card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) At the beginning of your end step, this creature deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: UR10 Wield the Eludha
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: UR11 Rage of the Tuskeri
card.text: Target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn. Then it deals damage equal to twice its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

card.name: CG03 Stalking Thallid
card.text: Vigilance When this creature dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: CG05 Qal Sisma Sabertooth
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to your hand or pay {2}. Vigilance

card.name: Vorinclex, Force of Nature
card.text: Haste Whenever Vorinclex or another creature you control enters, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until your next turn. Whenever a creature an opponent controls enters, prevent all damage dealt by creatures that player controls until their next turn.

card.name: Harness the Conflux
card.text: Choose one — • Target opponent sacrifices a creature of their choice. You gain 3 life. • Target opponent discards a card. You may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target opponent loses 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Kumena, Conqueror
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control ten or more permanents, put three +1/+1 counters on Kumena and draw a card. This ability triggers only once. {2}{G}{U}: Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof.

card.name: Stand Against Evil
card.text: When this enchantment enters, exile target creature or planeswalker. At the beginning of your first main phase, add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.

card.name: UBG02 Feed the Grove
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {2}. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: URG02 domris actual ambush
card.text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Then it deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: UWB01 Wayward Servant
card.text: Whenever another Zombie you control enters, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: CUR01 Noggle Cliffcaster
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: CC05 Chromatic Prism
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. Whenever this artifact becomes tapped, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: UC02 Corrupted Myr
card.text: Vengeance (When this creature dies with no decayed counters, return it to the battlefield with one. It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) {2}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw a card. Sacrifice this creature: Exile target player's graveyard.

card.name: UC05 Book of Vendettas
card.text: As this artifact enters, look at an opponent's hand, then choose any card name. Cards with the chosen name cost {2} more to cast, or {5} more if they're legendary. {2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: UC08 Oathsworn's Armaments
The Glistening Void
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}: Each player draws a card and gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.) {5}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
